import Modal from "react-modal/lib/components/Modal"; import CloseIcon from "../../../assets/close.png" import "./style.css" import { useState } from "react"; function EnderecoModal(props){ const [endereco, setEndereco] = useState(''); const [complemento, setComplemento] = useState(''); const [bairro, setBairro] = useState(''); return

Editar Endereço

setEndereco(e.target.value)} className="form-control mb-2" id="InputNome" aria-describedby="nome"/>
setComplemento(e.target.value)} className="form-control mb-2" placeholder="ex: Ap 63" id="InputNome" aria-describedby="nome"/>
setBairro(e.target.value)} className="form-control mb-2" id="InputNome" aria-describedby="nome"/>
} export default EnderecoModal;
